transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan
Customer: Sir dekhiye good evening India office se bol rahi hu aap se baat kar rahi hu
Executive: Haan
Customer: Sir ek service aapne abhi recently service launch kiya tha SB block India Mart ka platform se theek hai mujhe bataye sir kya feedback hai service uska
Customer: Service bahut bogus hai humko koi santushti nahi hai kyuki service hum humko local ki lead chahiye local ki lead milti nahi hai
Customer: Bas hamara ye bolna hai
Executive: Accha ek minute abhi aapne service select kiya do teen mahine ho gaye na
Customer: Haan
Customer: Sir service nahi mil rahi hai humko hum itna bol rahe hai baki golden wali hai kya ye bhi
Executive: Sir abhi hai na main aapko hai na aapko main manager se connect karwa deti hu theek hai
Customer: Ji ji haan haan haan okay
Executive: Ek minute line pe hi rehna
Customer: Haan
Executive: Line pe rehna aapko bas abhi time available hai kyuki local ka lead hum dene ke liye ready hai kisne bola aapko 100% local ka lead milega
Customer: Karwa ke dijiye na madam please
Executive: Ek minute
Customer: Karwa ke dijiye please
Executive: Haan line pe rehna line pe rehna
Customer: Main gaadi chala raha hu madam main niche rakh raha hu mobile aapne call karna mere ko main uthaunga baad theek hai
Executive: Sir abhi kyuki maine seller panel login kiya activity karne ke liye to aapka bhi hona jaruri hai
Executive: To mujhe bataye main kis time aapka matlab system ke samne ho tabhi main ye sara cheeze discussion kar paau nahi main aapko OTP vagaira kuch nahi de paunga main
Customer: Haan
Customer: OTP vagaira dunga nahi main aapko baki aap jo karana hai karaiye aap
Executive: Kuch bhi nahi chahiye mujhe mujhe aapka catalog me kaam karna hai recent lead me jana hai aur aapka jo kuch lead me abhi Aurangabad me aap kitne baje abhi ye koi call karne ka time hai kya pehle bataye aap kitne baje ka
Customer: Abhi
Customer: Shaam ke kitne baje
Customer: 6 baj rahe hai abhi office office ke liye office se ghar ke liye nikal gaya hu abhi ye time thodi hai aap mere ko subah subah call kijiye na 11 o clock par
Executive: 11 o clock par theek hai main call kar leti hu theek hai
Customer: Okay madam okay
Executive: Chalega okay
Executive: Yahi bola tha aapne maine bol rahi hu
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting local leads as promised.

- Dissatisfied with the service.

- Objects to call at 6 PM.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with manager.

- Executive will call back at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, local leads, call time
